ch.lambdaj.function.matcher
Class LambdaJMatcher<T>

java.lang.Object
  org.hamcrest.BaseMatcher<T>
      ch.lambdaj.function.matcher.LambdaJMatcher<T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.hamcrest.Matcher<T>, org.hamcrest.SelfDescribing
Direct Known Subclasses:
AndMatcher, HasArgumentWithValue, HasNestedPropertyWithValue, OrMatcher, Predicate
public abstract class LambdaJMatcher<T>
extends org.hamcrest.BaseMatcher<T>

A Matcher that extends the Hamcrest BaseMatcher by adding two fluent interface style methods that allow to logically combine two matchers.

Author:
Mario Fusco

and

public final LambdaJMatcher<T> and(org.hamcrest.Matcher<T> matcher)
Creates an and matcher combining this matcher and the given one

Parameters:
matcher - The matcher to be put in and with this one
Returns:
A matcher that return true if this matcher and the passed one return true

Returns:
A matcher that return true if this matcher or the passed one return true
